40-year old Kristie MacNuddle had a bit of a reputation, both for her constant obsession with the newest health fads and for dragging her daughters into them with her, frequently against their will. The woman was currently on a nudism kick, which was what had led to the current situation.

Also in the car were the brightly blushing 16-year old Lisa, mortified by the amount of eyes that would soon see her naked body, and the eleven year old twins, Becca and Elly. While Becca was currently suffering from the same anxieties as her sisters, Elly joined her mother in a complete lack of embarrassment. In fact, she was rather excited for the trip.

The five of them had barely set foot on the beach when Kristie “suggested” they all take their clothes off, which her daughters reluctantly complied with, and went back to lock the assembled clothing in the car for safekeeping (and so her daughters couldn’t chicken out).

info.brief_description: Tales of nudity on the beach!
info.description:
Come one, come all, to your one stop shop for beach related nudity. In which girls... are naked... on the beach... whether by choice or by circumstances beyond their control.

Let me lay down the rules!

This is primarily an ENF story, but if you want to write about a girl who’s unbothered by or even flaunting her nudity, be my guest.

No underage sex or rape/non-con. I’d prefer if the focus was kept on nudity.

The beach in question has to be a public beach, no private beaches or nude beaches.

So, with no further ado, let us begin!
